attributes.action: Turning off Half the street lights.....
attributes.additional_details: I would like to propose turning off every other street-light in acceptable locations ensuring it does not effect a pedestrians safety. This will half the electricity bill and dramatically reduce the levels of light pollution. in some areas the street lighting could even be completely turned-off at certain times of the night.

rejection.details: Street lights on all but motorways and major A-roads are the responsibility of local authorities (county councils, unitary authorities or London boroughs).
